definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Switch off your phone and allow messages to go to voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 將你手機關機，讓信息轉到語音信箱。

sentences.english: I tried. The line was busy. I left a message in his voice mail box.
sentences.chinese: 我試過，忙線中，我己經在語音信箱裏留話了。

sentences.english: Can I apply for a V-mail here ?
sentences.chinese: 我可以申請一個語音信箱嗎？

sentences.english: Would you like to leave a message on his voice mail，then？
sentences.chinese: 那您要不要留話在他的語音信箱裏？

sentences.english: Once I got voicemail. But usually it rings off the hook.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我接通了語音信箱，但是通常電話都無人接聽。

sentences.english: Do you ever leave messages for people on their voice mail?
sentences.chinese: 你在他們的語音信箱留過言嗎？

sentences.english: Forget that next date; let her argue with your voice mail.
sentences.chinese: 下一次約會就免談了，讓她跟你的語音信箱來溝通吧。

sentences.english: Check e-mail and voicemail at set intervals instead of randomly every few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 定時檢查郵件和語音信箱來代替每幾分鐘就查看一次。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, I have forgotten my three-digit access code.
sentences.chinese: 但不巧的是，我忘記了進入語音信箱的三位數密碼。

sentences.english: Screen all your calls through voice mail.
sentences.chinese: 把你的所有來電都轉到語音信箱。

sentences.english: I checked his voicemail and my fears were confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 我檢查了他的語音信箱，我所擔心的被證實。

sentences.english: Leave a message if you get voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 如果是語音信箱，就留個口信。

sentences.english: Leave a message on my voicemail.
Calls to your number are automatically forwarded to voicemail if you don't answer within 30 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 如果你三十秒內未接電話，來電會自動轉到語音信箱。

sentences.english: If the phone rings, I let it go to voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 電話響了，我就等它進入語音信箱。
